screen_size_button: This is a screen size button that functions on double click to start recording speech to help the user run a command
list_of_commands: Here's the list of commands that can be called in Home page:
command1: Command number 1 is camera which is basically to open the camera and capture images to receive image information
command1_info: which opens the camera and capture images to receive image information
